character.name: Walter White
character.role: High school chemestry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer
character.quote: Say my name!

character.name: Jessie Pinkman
character.role: Former student of Walter White and methamphetamine manufacturer
character.quote: Yeah, science!

character.name: Mike Ehrmantraut
character.role: Former police officer turned fixer and enforcer for Gus Fring and Saul Goodman
character.quote: Just because you shot Jesse James...don't make you Jesse James!

character.name: Lydia Rodarte-Quayle
character.role: Executive at Madrigal Electromotive and key player in the methamphetamine operation
character.quote: I'm not a criminal, I just work for one!

character.name: Hector Salamanca
character.role: Former enforcer for the Mexican drug cartel
character.quote: He really did a number on you.

character.name: Henry R. "Hank" Schrader
character.role: DEA Agent, Wlater White's brother-in-law
character.quote: My name is ASAC Schrader, and you can go f*** yourself!

character.name: Jane Margolis
character.role: Tattoo artist, Jesse Pinkman's girlfriend
character.quote: I guess I just noticed that you're... a little... lonely.

character.name: Gustavo "Gus" Fring
character.role: Owner of Los Pollos Hermanos, high-ranking drug kingpin.
character.quote: What does a man do, Walter? A man provides for his family.

character.name: James Morgan "jimmy" McGill
character.role: Criminal lawyer, ownert of Saul Goodman & Associates
character.quote: It's all good, man!

character.name: Skyler White
character.role: Walter White's wife bookkeeper, money launderer
character.quote: Someone has to protect this family from the man who protects this family!

character.name: Todd Alquist
character.role: Worker for Vamonos Pest, enforcer for Jacl Welker's gang, meth cook
character.quote: Sorry for your loss.

character.name: Tuco Salamanca
character.role: High-ranking member of the Juarez Cartel, drug dealer
character.quote: Tight, tight, tight!

character.name: Walter Hartwell White Jr.
character.role: Walter White's son, high school student
character.quote: Why don't you just die already?

character.name: Brandon Mayhew
character.role: Jesse Pinkman's friend, small-time meth dealer
character.quote: Yo, yo, yo! What's up, man?

character.name: Gale Boetticher
character.role: Chemist, assistant to Gustavo Fring, meth cook
character.quote: Chemestry is the study of change!

character.name: Huell Babineaux
character.role: Bodyguard and associate of Saul Goodman
character.quote: I'm not gonna lie, I'm kinda nervous!

character.name: Marie Schrader
character.role: Skyler White's sister, Hank Schrader's wife, a kleptomaniac
character.quote: I am not a bad person, I'm just a woman who got over her head.

character.name: Ted Beneke
character.role: Skyler white's former boss and romantic interest
character.quote: You know what? You're a very special person, and I think you're a very good person, too.

character.name: Christian Ortega
character.role: Street-level drug dealer, associate of Jesse Pinkman
character.quote: Man, I'm just trying to make a living out here!

character.name: Gretchen Schwartz
character.role: Former co-founder of Gray Matter Technologies, Walter White's chemestry partner and ex-girlfriend
character.quote: You could have had everything. You could have had it all!

character.name: Jack Welker
character.role: Leader of white supremacist gang, associated with meth production and distribution
character.quote: You know who I am? I'm the guy who's gonna kill you.

character.name: Leonel Salamanca
character.role: Hitman for the Juarez Cartel, Twin brother of Marco Salamanca
character.quote: I'm going to kill you!

character.name: Juan Bolsa
character.role: High-ranking member of the Juarez Cartel, involved in drug trafficking
character.quote: We are all in danger. And I am your last line of defense.

character.name: Patrick Kuby
character.role: Associate of Saul Goodman, involved in criminal activities
character.quote: You know what? I think I'm gonna pass on this one. You guys can handle this one.

character.name: Marco Salamanca
character.role: Hitman for the Juarez Cartel, twin brother of the Leonel Salamanca
character.quote: You know who we are, right? We're the guys who brings the pain.

character.name: Skinny Pete
character.role: Friend of jesse Pinkman, small-time drug dealer.
character.quote: Yo, man, don't need your drama.

character.name: Steven Gomez
character.role: DEA agent, partner to Hank Schrader
character.quote: We're not in the meth business. We're in the business of catching meth dealers

character.name: Tyrus Kitt
character.role: Bodyguard and enforcer for Gus Fring
character.quote: He's not here. He's not here.

character.name: Victor
character.role: Enforcer and associate of Gus Fring
character.quote: He knows who I am. He knows I'm not going anywhere.
